contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The order of the Commonwealth Court, 72 Pa.Cmwlth 331, 452 A.2d 1126, entered on February 28, 1983 is reversed. The order of the Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission is reinstated. Pennsylvania Public Utility Commission v. Pennsylvania Gas & Water Company, 492 Pa. 326, 424 A.2d 1213 (1980), cert. denied, 454 U.S. 824, 102 S.Ct. 112, 70 L,Ed.2d 97 (1981).
